But then when I opened Office for the first time it still prompted me for a license key. I didn't have anything else so I used the trial key. Now it's just set up like a trial and will expire in 30 days. 

Did I do something wrong here ? I'd like a permanent copy. Thanks for your help.

Should I leave that button clicked and allow it to try and activate it online ? That doesn't seem right, but it's the only thing that seems to be a question.
